overview_of_class: Definition of a function, trigonometric, exponential, logarithmic and inverse functions, graphs, limits, continuity, derivative of a function, product, quotient and chain rule, linear approximation and differentials, mean value theorem, optimization problems, Newton's method.
name: Single Variable Calculus I
subject: MATH
